DOC.HEADLINE: JUST THE FACTS ; VISA REQUIREMENTS / PART I
DOC.TEXT: More_than 70 countries require visas from U.S. travelers crossing their borders . Below are the requirements ( number of copies of applications and photos , amount of fees ) to obtain visas for many countries in Africa.They may be obtained from the appropriate consulates or embassies in the traveler ' s area , or by using a variety of commercial services usually listed under " passport and visa services " in the telephone_directory . Next week : visas for Central and South_America and the Middle_East . 04 # 17 , 14 # 08 , 07 Applications Photos Fees Algeria 2 2 $ 12 Benin 2 2 20 Burkina Faso 2 2 20 Burundi 3 3 11 Cameroon 2 2 65.22 Cape Verde 1 1 11 Central_Africa 2 2 30 Chad 3 3 25 Congo 2 2 30 Djibouti 2 2 15 Eritrea 1 2 10 Ethiopia 1 1 50 Gabon 2 2 65 Gambia 1 1 12 Ghana 1 4 18 Guinea-Bissau 3 3 12 Guinea , Rep . of 3 3 25 Kenya 1 2 10 Liberia 2 2 Free Mali 2 2 17 Mozambique 2 2 15 Niger 3 3 56.07 Nigeria 2 2 Free Rwanda 2 2 30 Sierra_Leone 1 1 Free Sudan 1 1 9 Tanzania 1 1 10.50 Zaire 3 3 75 Zambia 2 2 10 Source : Trans-World Visa Service , San Francisco
